section.title: Prerequisites
section.para: DNet eBusiness Suite requires Java 6 or later to be installed. It is available from http://www.java.com

section.title: Installing from the zip download
section.para: Extract the contents of the archive somewhere on your computer, lets say C:/dnet Inside you should find a virgo-tomcat-server-3.0.0.RC1 folder which contains a Virgo web-server already configured to run DNet. So go to virgo-tomcat-server-3.0.0.RC1/bin folder and double-click the startup.bat .
It opens a console window showing the steps performed during startup. Wait to finish then go to your browser and type in the adress bar:
Click the logo which redirects you to the application setup section. Sign-in with user 'admin' and password 'admin'.
